mapper.select: select seq_protector seqProtector, protector_id protectorId, protector_password protectorPassword, protector_name protectorName, protector_age protectorAge, protector_gender protectorGender, protector_address protectorAddress, protector_phoneNo protectorPhoneNo, protector_important_point protectorImportantPoint, protector_join_date protectorJoinDate, protector_role protectorRole, protector_update_date protectorUpdateDate, protector_leave_flag protectorLeaveFlag from Protector where seq_protector = #{seqProtector}

SELECT dia.seq_diagnosis AS seqDiagnosis, a.animal_name AS animalName, date_format(dia.diagnosis_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS diagnosisDate, dia.diagnosis_symptom AS diagnosisSymptom, ah.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName FROM diagnosis AS dia JOIN animal AS a ON dia.seq_animal = a.seq_animal JOIN protector AS p ON dia.seq_protector = p.seq_protector JOIN animalhospital AS ah ON dia.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital WHERE dia.seq_protector = #{seq_protector} ORDER BY dia.diagnosis_date DESC

SELECT a.animal_name as animalName, (date_format(now(),'%Y') - date_format(animal_age,'%Y')) AS animalAge, a.animal_type AS animalType, a.animal_size AS animalSize, a.animal_weight AS animalWeight, p.protector_id AS protectorId, p.protector_name AS protectorName, p.protector_phoneNo AS protectorPhone, p.protector_address AS protectorAddress from Animal AS a join protector AS p ON a.seq_protector=p.seq_protector WHERE a.seq_protector = #{seqProtector}

select a.animal_name as animalName, p.postscript_satisfaction AS postscriptSatisfaction, ah.animal_hospital_name as animalHospitalname, d.diagnosis_date AS diagnosisDate FROM Animal as a join Postscript as p on a.seq_doctor=p.seq_doctor join Animalhospital as ah on p.seq_doctor=ah.seq_doctor join Diagnosis as d on ah.seq_doctor=d.seq_doctor WHERE a.seq_protector=#{seqProtector} group by animal_name
